org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class Padding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AbstractDynamicConfiguration<IsPadding>
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.Padding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultPadding, IsPadding

    public final class Padding
extends AbstractDynamicConfiguration<IsPadding>
implements IsPadding
    Maps the additional space to apply to the sides of elements (left, top, right, bottom), in pixels.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
